typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Client_PK as integer,
		ClientCode as string,
		Client as string,
		TypeClient as string,
		SegmentationClient as string,
		DateDebut as timestamp,
		DateFin as timestamp,
		IsRowCurrent as integer,
		LastUpdated as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
